body:
Comment 7: 
"...command shell on most versions of windows AFAIK, accepts forward slashes..."

dir command (and many others) doesn't:

C:\>dir c:\z
 Volume in drive C has no label.
 Volume Serial Number is 1021-46BD

 Directory of c:\z

14/03/2011  10:41 AM    <DIR>          .
14/03/2011  10:41 AM    <DIR>          ..
               0 File(s)              0 bytes
               2 Dir(s)   5,854,519,296 bytes free

C:\>dir c:/z
Invalid switch - "z".

C:\>
